generate.subject: Project Collaboration Inquiry
generate.body:
Hi [Name],

I came across your work on [Platform/Website] and was really impressed by [Specific Project/Achievement].

I'm currently working on [Your Project] and believe there could be some great synergy between our work. I'd love to discuss potential collaboration opportunities.

Are you available for a brief call next week?

Best regards,
[Your Name]

finetune.subject: Re: Project Collaboration Inquiry
finetune.body:
Dear [Name],

I hope you're having a great week.

I wanted to follow up on my previous note regarding a potential collaboration. I truly believe our combined expertise could lead to something impactful.

Let me know if you have some time to chat.

Best,
[Your Name]
